transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha akhilesh ji good afternoon kaise hain?
Customer: Good afternoon ji kya hai matlab inko call karo to ji bahut premium service hai har jagah challenges aate hain inquiries badhi nahi hai conversion badha nahi hai main kya inse baat karu batao na in madam ko main kya kahu ye keh rahi hai aapko bahut premium service mili hai matlab kya hai ye ye main trust se bhi poor response aa raha hai.
Executive: Accha accha nahi.
Customer: Vijay naam ka banda tha jisko lagta hai mujhe screen problem thi kuch bye bye kya keh ke baat karta tha usne kaha chalo theek hai vijay karke koi banda hai aapke jisne isko ha matlab kya hai ye log.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Yaar service nahi dete ho aap switch kar do trust me mujhe nahi chahiye mera mera patience jawab de raha hai aap kahoge nahi ji mujhe ek mahina hua hai nahi ji do mahina hua hai.
Executive: Ha ha ha.
Executive: Theek hai main ek minute check karta hu sir wo isme bataye sir aapne jo screenshot bheja tha.
Customer: Chandeliers aur category jab add ho rahi hai to kya kehte hain isme is tarike ka problem aa raha hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi problem nahi main aapko batata hu jaise product hai hanging chandeliers hai na to usme ye kehna chah raha hai ki sirf aap hanging chandelier hi lagao chandeliers agar sirf aap product add kar rahe ho to usme chandeliers aap category laga lena chalo iske agar aap chah rahe ho ki nahi main chahta hu ki dono hi category lage to aap laga dijiye koi problem nahi hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Wo review karne ke liye keh raha tha basically ab jaise man lijiye sir aap ek specific cheez bana rahe ho leather shoe hai ki nahi sir aur aapne leather shoe to category laga hi di sath mein aap cha rahe ho shoes category bhi laga do problem kya aayegi jab koi lead generate hogi to aapke liye na sports shoe ki bhi aayegi formal shoe ki bhi aayegi to fir aap kahoge ki ye to mere product ke according nahi aa raha hai main to leather shoe sell karna chah raha hu aur aap mujhe formal shoe aur ye sab bhejo sports shoe bhejo to ye lekin mujhe ha boliye sir aap boliye.
Customer: Main keh raha hu ki itni jo challenges aa rahi hai to inquiries bhi kahan badh rahi hai wo bhi to nahi badh raha hai kuch inquiry badhe.
Executive: Inquiry to increase hui hai sir main chart bheju aapko.
Customer: Kahan inquiry kuch nahi inquiry increase hui hai.
Executive: Pehle ke comparison mein to thodi badhi thi october month mein main kahunga 96 is month abhi aayi hai till date 17 tarikh tak aur pichle month 186 gayi thi direct inquiry calls ka agar main dekhu to last month jo hai in totality 91 calls gayi thi aur abhi jo till date hai wo 47 calls gayi hai aapke paas 41 picked hai aur six missed hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Aur matlab agar ek baat kahu main dekhiye aap use nahi kar rahe main system use kar raha hu bahut poor response hai meri baat samajh mein aa rahi hai agar aap kar sakte ho to theek hai otherwise isko sahi karo otherwise mera switch karke chhod do usme hai na main bahut jyada disappointing lag raha hai ki matlab kya service de di aapne.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Accha accha lekin sir aisa nahi ho sakta ki ek bhi conversion na aaya ho kisi se baat to hui hogi positive kuch to baat hui hogi ki ha bhai product chahiye tha price nahi baith raha hai product nahi chahiye wo.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Itni sari leads inquiries calls hai october se november month matlab aapko takriban takriban man ke chaliye ki dedh mahina hone ko aa raha hai.
Customer: Mahesh kuch nahi bata to raha hu koi improve nahi hai tabhi mera jo hai na madam ka kehna hai ki bahut premium service aapko mili hui hai kya bakwas premium service hai.
Executive: Har services to chalo aapne star services liye to to hai accha mujhe ek cheez batayega jaise do char customer aapke hain recently unhone matlab feedback bhi achcha diya tha star rating bhi aapko di thi october month.
Customer: Ji sir thodi sab faltu ki cheeze mujhe business chahiye meri baat rating setting zero kar do usse koi fark nahi padta mujhe business chahiye ultimately aayi baat samajh mein agar rating deni hoti to main khud ki website banwata fir usko rating dilwa raha hota.
Executive: Nahi to na na rating pe diya jaise quality ke liye diya hai four star five star diya hai.
Customer: Wo sab kuch log dete hain kuch log dete hain kuch nahi dete main meri team iske liye kabhi unse puch bhi nahi karti ki aap rating do ha ha hai na hota kya hai na ki cheeze samjho aap ultimately outcome is zero.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Meri baat samajh rahe hain aap.
Executive: Theek hai main aapki baat ko samajh raha hu sir lekin isko main believe kaise karu ki outcome abhi tak zero hi hai matlab aapke paas record dikha nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi suniye to meri baat cross check to hota hoga na cross check me to ek ladki thi kehti thi nahi ji hum log baat karte hain aapka conversion badh raha hai aap khud cross check kar lo ki vastav me kya unhone liya hai ki nahi.
Executive: Bilkul cross check kar lo.
Executive: Are sir main exactly bata raha hu aapko lead manager ka data aapka hum log nahi dekh sakte samjho aap hamare mein dummy account leke aata hai to as such koi bhi conversation aap ya aapke buyer ke beech mein jo bhi hui hoti hai hum nahi dekh sakte theek hai isiliye main aapse puch raha tha ki jaise dedh mahine me conversion bahut main to abhi conversion aata to maine isi ke liye liya hai na ki result achcha hai ha ji ji ji zahir si baat hai sir bilkul aur theek hai dekhiye main aur client se baat kar raha hu aap apni taraf se working karo agar nahi samajh mein aata isko trust me dal ke chhod do main se kahin aur lagau theek hai main to matlab main hai na mera main result oriented aadmi hu aayi baat samajh mein main salaried aapki tarah salaried banda nahi hu main businessman aadmi hu is salaried aati rahegi kaam ho ya na ho usse koi fark nahi padta sir dekhiye sabhi log I think result oriented hi rehna chahte hain nahi mujhe nahi lagta mujhe nahi lagta lagta to agar result aata to aapne is madam ne na kabhi koi call kiya na kuch bhi ki ha ji chalo theek hai abhi se mere aapka account aaya hai ye kya hai aap kya karte kar rahe hain background mein aapko kya improvement dikh raha hai
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Kuch nahi aaya.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART services, no increase in inquiries.

- Poor response from TrustSeal.

- Wants to switch to TrustSeal.

- No improvement in business.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's account details.

- Executive explained category selection for product listing.

- Executive explained lead manager data cannot be accessed.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will work on the account.

- If no improvement, the account will be switched to TrustSeal.



Alert (If Any):

- switch



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, trustseal, inquiries, conversion, rating
